name: Teleformer
description:
Teleformer is a 2D platformer puzzle game that explores the mechanic of telekinetically linked objects.

Final Presentation

Here're the assets we used:

Main Background:

https://pixahive.com/photo/hills-and-mountain-peaks-illustration/

Pixel Art Platformer - Village Props:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-platformer-village-props-166114

Small Heart by Shlok Gupta

https://gamedevelopershlok.itch.io/heartpack

Slime:

https://ivess.itch.io/slime-animations-pack

Green Beam and Ice:

https://thetgi.itch.io/basic-pico-platformer

Door:

https://jan-schneider.itch.io/color-switches

Health Bar:

https://github.com/Brackeys/Health-Bar/blob/master/Health%20Bar/Assets/Sprites/Bar.png

Cloud Backgrounds:

https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-sky-with-clouds-background-pixel-art-set?download

Tileset and Props:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/free-pixel-art-kit-211149

Fire:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/pixel-fx-fire-221146
